channel.title: Sprite number help
channel.description:
ok im trying to add dragon armor, everything is good to go exept for my lItemWieldableDef.xml
im looking for the sprite id's for dragon armor (1315-1321) i have the wield pos. and the type..
some how i turned my self in to a sheep witch was rly funny
can any one check your ItemWieldableDef.xml and tell me what the sprite numbers,, thanks
also any idea's on stats would be cool 2. atm i have got my full dragon set to look like black armor, but at least it can be used
(here is the code to turn a worthless ammy into a sheep) have fun with it [code] <entry> <int>1009</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>130</sprite> <type>1024</type> <wieldPos>8</wieldPos> <armourPoints>20</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>true</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> [/code]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QsJSexz5l34

item.title: Sprite number help
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

ok im trying to add dragon armor,
everything is good to go exept for my lItemWieldableDef.xml

im looking for the sprite id’s for dragon armor (1315-1321)
i have the wield pos. and the type…

some how i turned my self in to a sheep witch was rly funny

can any one check your ItemWieldableDef.xml and tell me what the sprite numbers, thanks

also any idea’s on stats would be cool 2.
atm i have got my full dragon set to look like black armor, but at least it can be used

(here is the code to turn a worthless ammy into a sheep) have fun with it

	<entry>
		<int>1009</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>130</sprite>
			<type>1024</type>
			<wieldPos>8</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>20</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>true</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>

Read full topic
